recipes.name: githeri
recipes.description: Tender beef simmered with carrots and potatoes.
recipes.ingredients: Beef, carrots, potatoes, onions, garlic, tomato paste, spices
recipes.instructions: Brown beef, add chopped veggies, simmer until soft and flavorful.

recipes.name: Luo-Style Fried
recipes.description: Whole tilapia fish deep-fried and served with ugali and saut√©ed greens.
recipes.ingredients: Whole tilapia, salt, lemon juice, garlic, cooking oil, sukuma wiki, maize flour
recipes.instructions: Clean and score the fish. Marinate with salt, garlic, and lemon. Deep-fry until golden brown. Serve with ugali and fried sukuma wiki.
recipes.textArea: Clean and score the fish. Marinate with salt, garlic, and lemon. Deep-fry until golden brown. Serve with ugali and fried sukuma wiki

recipes.name: Mango
recipes.description: Refreshing tropical drink for hot days.
recipes.ingredients: Ripe mangoes, yogurt, honey, ice cubes
recipes.instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve chilled.
